speech:
Most healthy adults need between 7 to 9 hours of sleep per night to function at their best. Find out more information here - 
https://sleepfoundation.org/excessivesleepiness/content/how-much-sleep-do-we-really-need-0
Let me ask you this - Do you find it difficult to concentrate on your daily tasks?
